QuestData.Title: West to the Strand
QuestData.Description: $n, I have a friend who could make good use of particular talents. His name is Talen and he's an archaeologist of sorts. Recently he's been fascinated with the upheaval of the old city of Zoram and its treasures.$B$BIf you're willing to lend him a hand, you can find him at the Blackfathom Camp down the path to the west.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Talen at the Blackfathom Camp in Ashenvale.
QuestData.RewardText: Hello, $c.$B$BWhat's that? You say that Shyela sent you?$B$B<The night elf briskly rubs his nimble hands together.>$B$BVery well, let's get started.
